DOC.detailed_description: The overall goal study assess effect switch Very-Low-Nicotine-Content cigarette ( VLNCCs ) among non-daily , intermittent smoker ( ITS ) . This two-arm randomized study own-cigarette baseline control . After 2-week baseline period smoking cigarette , 455 ITS randomize ( double-blind ) 10 week smoke experimental cigarette , either : ( ) normal nicotine content cigarette ( NNCCs ; 0.8 mg ) ( b ) VLNCCs ( 0.07 mg ) , match menthol status subject ' prefer brand . ITS likely African-American ( AA ) smoker ; thus AA smoker oversampled ( one third total sample ) . Change cigarette consumption primary end-point , biomarkers smoke exposure measure smoke intensity also assess .
